text: Askeloni kumapi vahe'mo'za Tairi kumapima fore'ma hania zama kesu'za, tusi zamagogogu hugahaze. Gaza kumate vahemo'zane, Ekroni kumate vahe'mo'zanena ana zanke hu'za zamahirahiku hugahaze. Na'ankure amuha'ma nehaza zamo'a haviza hugahie. Gaza kumate kini nera ahe nefrisageno, Askeloni kumapina vahera omanigahaze.
